attributes.action: ban abortion unless for medical reason or a woman has been raped.abortion is murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: abotion should be ban unless there is a medical reason or a woman has been raped.abortion is murder,just because you dont plan to have a baby does not give u the right to kill it.a baby is a human being from the minute it is conceved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
